bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method And Apparatus For Pricing Products In Multi-Level Product And Organizational Groups

abstract.p: The invention organizes various pricing tables and price adjustment tables and various products and purchasing organizations based on "who" (i.e. which purchasing organization) is purchasing "what" (i.e. which product). The invention utilizes a denormalized table to relate the "who" to the "what" using denormalized numbers. The invention further organizes various purchasing organizations and products into hierarchical tables. These hierarchical tables are called organizational groups and product groups. Various price adjustments may be specified for each level of the organizational groups and product groups hierarchies. The price adjustments for a particular purchasing organization are determined by retrieving the price adjustments for that particular purchasing organization as well as the price adjustments for organizational groups above the particular purchasing organization in the organizational groups hierarchy. Likewise, the price adjustments for a particular product are determined by retrieving the price adjustments for that particular product as well as the price adjustments for product groups above the particular product in the product groups hierarchy. The invention sorts the various pricing adjustments applicable to a particular product offered to a particular purchasing group based on several criteria. After the sorting is accomplished the pricing adjustments are applied in sequence to arrive at a final price at which a particular product can be sold to a particular purchasing organization.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and apparatus for pricing products in multi-level product and organizational groups
Method and apparatus for pricing products in multi-level product and organizational groups
Processo e aparelho para taxar produtos em grupos organizacionais e de produtos de mltiplos níveis

abstract.p: Patente de Invenção:"PROCESSO E APARELHO PARA TAXAR PRODUTOS EM GRUPOS ORGANIZADORES E DE PRODUTOS DE MúLTIPLOS NìVEIS"<D>. A invenção organiza diversas tabelas de taxação e tabelas de ajuste de preço e vários produtos e organizações de compra com base em "quem" ( isto é, qual a organização de compra) está comprando "o quê" (isto é, qual produto). A invenção utiliza uma tabela desregularizada para relacionar "quem" a "o que" com o uso de números desregularizados. A invenção adicionalmente organiza diversas organizações de compra e produtos em tabelas hierárquicas. Estas tabelas hierárquicas são denominadas de grupos organizacionais e grupos de produtos. Diversos ajustes de preço podem ser especificados para cada nível dos grupos organizacionais e hierarquias dos grupos de produtos.

Os ajustes de preço para uma organização de compra específica são determinados através da recuperação dos ajustes de preço para a organização de compra específica, bem como os ajustes de preço para os grupos organizacionais acima da organização de compra específica na hierarquia de grupos organizacionais. Igualmente, os ajustes de preço para um produto específico são determinados através da recuperação dos ajustes de preço para o produto específico, bem como os ajustes de preço para os grupos de produtos acima do produto específico na hierarquia de grupos de produto. A invenção classifica os diversos ajustes de taxação aplicáveis a um produto específico oferecido a um grupo de compra específico com base em vários critérios.

Depois que a classificação é conseguida, os ajustes de taxação são aplicados em seq ência para chegar a um preço final no qual o produto específico pode ser vendido a uma organização de compra em particular.

abstract.p: The invention organizes various pricing tables and price adjustment tables and various products and purchasing organizations based on "who" (i.e. which purchasing organization) is purchasing "what" (i.e. which product). The invention utilizes a denormalized table to relate the "who" to the "what" using denormalized numbers. The invention further organizes various purchasing organizations and products into hierarchical tables. These hierarchical tables are called organizational groups and product groups. Various price adjustments may be specified for each level of the organizational groups and product groups hierarchies. The price adjustments for a particular purchasing organization are determined by retrieving the price adjustments for that particular purchasing organization as well as the price adjustments for organizational groups above the particular purchasing organization in the organizational groups hierarchy. Likewise, the price adjustments for a particular product are determined by retrieving the price adjustments for that particular product as well as the price adjustments for product groups above the particular product in the product groups hierarchy. The invention sorts the various pricing adjustments applicable to a particular product offered to a particular purchasing group based on several criteria. After the sorting is accomplished the pricing adjustments are applied in sequence to arrive at a final price at which a particular product can be sold to a particular purchasing organization.

The invention utilizes a denormalized table to relate the "who" to the "what" using denormalized numbers. The invention further organizes various purchasing organizations and products into hierarchical tables. These hierarchical tables are called organizational groups and product groups. Various price adjustments may be specified for each level of the organizational groups and product groups hierarchies.

The price adjustments for a particular purchasing organization are determined by retrieving the price adjustments for that particular purchasing organization as well as the price adjustments for organizational groups above the particular purchasing organization in the organizational groups hierarchy. Likewise, the price adjustments for a particular product are determined by retrieving the price adjustments for that particular product as well as the price adjustments for product groups above the particular product in the product groups hierarchy. The invention sorts the various pricing adjustments applicable to a particular product offered to a particular purchasing group based on several criteria. After the sorting is accomplished the pricing adjustments are applied in sequence to arrive at a final price at which a particular product can be sold to a particular purchasing organization.

PROCEDE ET APPAREIL POUR LA TARIFICATION DE PRODUITS DANS DES GROUPES DE PRODUITS MULTINIVEAUX ET DES GROUPES D'ORGANISATIONS

abstract.p: The invention organizes various pricing tables and price adjustment tables and various products and purchasing organizations based on "who" (i.e. which purchasing organization) is purchasing "what" (i.e. which product). The invention utilizes a denormalized table to relate the "who" to the "what" using denormalized numbers. The invention further organizes various purchasing organizations and products into hierarchical tables. These hierarchical tables are called organizational groups and product groups. Various price adjustments may be specified for each level of the organizational groups and product groups hierarchies.

The price adjustments for a particular purchasing organization are determined by retrieving the price adjustments for the particular purchasing organization as well as the price adjustments for organizational groups above the particular purchasing organization in the organizational groups hierarchy. Likewise, the price adjustments for a particular product are determined by retrieving the price adjustments for that particular product as well as the price adjustments for product groups above the particular product in the product groups hierarchy. The invention sorts the various pricing adjustments applicable to a particular product offered to a particular purchasing group based on several criteria. After the sorting is accomplished, the pricing adjustments are applied in sequence to arrive at a final price at which a particular product can be sold to a particular purchasing organizazion.

L'invention permet de mettre au point divers tableaux de tarification et tableaux d'ajustement des prix ainsi que divers produits et organisations d'achats, sur la base de "qui" (c'est-à-dire quelle organisation d'achats) achète "quoi" (c'est-à-dire quel produit). L'invention fait appel à un tableau dénormalisé pour mettre en relation le "qui" avec le "quoi" à l'aide de nombres dénormalisés. Elle permet également de classer diverses organisations d'achats et divers produits en tableaux hiérarchiques. Ces tableaux hiérarchiques sont appelés groupes d'organisations et groupes de produits. Divers ajustements de prix peuvent être spécifiés pour chaque niveau des hiérarchies de groupes d'organisations et de groupes de produits.

Ces ajustements de prix pour une organisation d'achats particulière sont déterminés par l'extraction des ajustements de prix pour cette organisation d'achats particulière ainsi que des ajustements de prix pour les groupes d'organisations situés au-dessus de cette organisation d'achats particulière dans la hiérarchie des groupes d'organisations. De même, les ajustements de prix pour un produit particulier sont déterminés par l'extraction des ajustements de prix pour ce produit particulier ainsi que des ajustements de prix pour les groupes de produits situés au-dessus de ce produit particulier dans la hiérarchie des groupes de produits. L'invention permet de classer les divers ajustements de prix applicables à un produit offert à un groupe d'achats particulier sur la base de plusieurs critères.
Une fois ce classement effectué, les ajustements de prix s'appliquent en séquence pour arriver à un prix final auquel un produit particulier peut être vendu à une organisation d'achats particulière.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PRICING PRODUCTS IN MULTI-LEVEL PRODUCT AND ORGANIZATIONAL GROUPS
